original_text: I know that you will surely be king and that the kingdom of Israel will be established in your hands.
korean_text: 보라 나는 네가 반드시 왕이 될 것을 알고 이스라엘 나라가 네 손에 견고히 설 것을 아노니

sentences.original_text: that you will surely be king
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 반드시 왕이 될 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that the kingdom of Israel
will be established in your hands
